title: Receive a Return Without an RMA
description: A customer sends back a return without first getting a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA). The returns department must handle this exception.

tasks.description: The returns department receives a package with no RMA number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The package is identified as an exception.

tasks.description: The operator opens the package and uses the packing slip or item inside to identify the original sales order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator successfully finds the original order in the system.

tasks.description: The operator creates a new RMA for the order retrospectively.
tasks.expected_outcome: An RMA is created so the return can be processed correctly.

tasks.description: The operator proceeds with the standard inspection and disposition process using the newly created RMA.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exception is resolved, and the return is processed normally.
